attributes.action: make the Over due Bridge in Lowestoft  be Built As Soon AS Possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have waited over Thirty Years for a Third Crossing in Lowestoft,the local Council Waveney District Council and Suffolk County Council have said it COSTS MONEY! they were able to get a lot of Money for Relief Roads and should have done them after the Third Crossing had been Built.Lowestoft has been at a Stand still for Years and because of the upheaval has caused Businesses to Close,we the undersigned need either a Third Crossing or  Tunnel or  Flyover and sooner rather that later.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
